title: Spencer Hall on the CFP, Eric Dickerson on 'Watch My Smoke'
description:
Bomani Jones chats with Spencer Hall about Georgia’s victory in the College Football Playoff National Championship over Alabama, including the performance of QB Stetson Bennett as well as the defense (1:32). Plus, Pro Football Hall of Famer Eric Dickerson joins to discuss his new autobiography “Watch My Smoke”, including just how he got that Trans Am at SMU (27:06)!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
